'''''Deianeira of Snezhevna''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Wind Operative|text=Deianeira of Snezhevna — Risky Investment Actuary}}.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Deianira}}, also known as Deianeira, is a Calydonian princess in Greek mythology, the wife of Heracles and also his unwittingly murderer with the poisoned Shirt of Nessus.
